description: Detects a Powershell process that contains download commands in its command line string
author: Florian Roth
oscd.community
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
name: PowerShell Download Pattern
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND (process.command_line.text:*new\-object* AND process.command_line.text:*net.webclient\).* AND process.command_line.text:*download* AND process.command_line.text:(*string\(* OR *file\(*)))
